articles.description: WASHINGTON -     President Joe Biden has tapped former Democratic senator and astronaut Bill Nelson to run the U.S. space agency NASA, according to two people familiar with the decision.

articles.title: Safety concerns determine level of public support for driverless vehicles, finds NTU study - EurekAlert
